name: GIMO
headline: We help underbanked workers get paid before payday
description: We are building a new financial platform that helps underbanked workers get paid as they earn it, anytime, anywhere. By partnering up with corporate employers, GIMO is providing a mobile financial application as a benefit to their employees, aiming at changing the way the employees earn, spend, save and invest.

founders.name: Quan Nguyen, Founder
founders.description: Quan is the co-founder and CEO of GIMO - a mobile financial app for underbanked workers to get paid on-demand. Prior to GIMO, Quan was an ex-Citibank executive managing its consumer banking division and used to lead capital raising and investments valued $100Mn in Vietnam's debt market at family offices and boutique investment funds. Quan holds an Executive MBA from Shidler College of Business, University of Hawaii at Manoa.

Live Better. Work Happier Empowering employees to access their earned wages before payday [Request Demo](https://gimo.vn/) ## Our partners and investors ![GIMO is one of the fastest payroll
solutions for businesses](https://gimo.vn/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/part-1.png) ![GIMO is one of the fastest payroll
solutions for businesses](https://gimo.vn/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/part-2.png) ![GIMO is one of the fastest payroll
solutions for businesses](https://gimo.vn/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/logo-mem.png) ![GIMO is one of the fastest payroll

solutions for businesses](https://gimo.vn/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/part-7.png) ### An app for workers to access their earned wages anytime ![An app for workers to access their earned wages anytime](https://gimo.vn/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/ap-1.png) ### An app for workers to access their earned wages anytime * Get paid on-demand Gain access to your hard-earned wages, when you need it. * Keep track of earnings Keep updated on your working days in real-time * Consume daily food for thoughts Visit our EduHub for tips and tricks on finances ### An easy-to-use dashboard for managers to manage on-demand pay transactions ![An easy-to-use dashboard for managers to manage on-demand pay transactions](https://gimo.vn/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/Realistic.png) ### An easy-to-use dashboard for managers to manage on-demand pay transactions * Monitor and manage HR data Enable more effortless payroll processing and timecheck management. * Cross-check on-demand pay transactions Track employees' on-demand pay transactions in a transparent way. * [Corporate](https://gimo.vn/) * [Employees](https://gimo.vn/) ##### Helping businesses implement a cost-free employee benefit ![Reduce HR expenses](https://gimo.vn/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/Reduce-HR.svg) #### Reduce HR expenses Payroll welfare increases the employees' engagement, reducing the turnover rate ![Increase productivity](https://gimo.vn/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/Increase-Productivity.svg) #### Increase productivity Ensure financial stability for better focus, productivity and efficiency ![Optimize HR process and resources](https://gimo.vn/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/Optimize-HR-5.svg) #### Optimize HR process and resources Enable more effortless payroll processing and timecheck management. ![Enhance cashflow management efficiency](https://gimo.vn/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/Enhance-Cashflow-3.svg) #### Enhance cashflow management efficiency A risk-free payroll reserve fund at zero cost ##### Giving employees greater control over when to get paid ![Accessible](https://gimo.vn/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/Accessible-3.svg) #### Accessible Allow employees to access their earned but unpaid wage at any time during the month ![Secured](https://gimo.vn/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/Secured.svg) #### Secured All data are provided and managed by the HR department, ensuring maximum security ![Peace of mind](https://gimo.vn/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/Peace-Of-Mind.svg) #### Peace of mind 24/7 year round access to earned wages ![Instant](https://gimo.vn/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/Quick.svg) #### Instant Transactions completed in only minutes #### Starting with on-demand pay, we look to better workers’ financial lives ![](https://gimo.vn/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/Group-7222.png) Ms #### DUONG TRAN HR Manager #### DUONG TRAN ###### HR Manager As the BOD of Mobicast, we believe that it is necessary to constantly explore new ways to enhance employee’s engagement and welfare. At first, the BOD was not yet able to evaluate the benefits of the program. However, we have been successfully persuaded with the positive feedbacks from our own employees, proving to us just how useful the program can be. ![](https://gimo.vn/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/mobicastwhite.png) ![](https://gimo.vn/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/Frame-36.png) Ms #### HUONG NGUYEN Factory Manager #### HUONG NGUYEN ###### Factory Manager GIMO enables our factory workers to access their pay anytime, helping them cope with unexpected expenses and alleviate their financial worries. ![](https://gimo.vn/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/tc-white.png) ![](https://gimo.vn/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/Frame-37-1.png) Mr #### LONG DOAN Factory Worker #### LONG DOAN ###### Factory Worker Using GIMO, I can access my earned income almost instantly. generated_description:
**Company Overview: GIMO**

Founded in 2019 and based in Hanoi, Vietnam, GIMO is on a mission to revolutionize the financial ecosystem for underbanked workers. As a part of Y Combinator’s Batch W22, GIMO has positioned itself as a key player in the fintech space, specifically focusing on payments.

**Mission and Offerings**

GIMO's primary goal is to help underbanked employees receive their pay when they earn it, rather than waiting for traditional pay periods. By partnering with corporate employers, GIMO provides a mobile financial application that offers on-demand access to earned wages, addressing a significant gap in financial services for many workers. This not only changes how employees earn but also influences how they spend, save, and invest their money.

**Key Features:**
1. **On-Demand Pay**: Workers can access their earnings anytime.
2. **User-Friendly Dashboards**: Designed for both employees and managers to manage pay transactions and track earnings seamlessly.
3. **Cost-Free Employee Benefit**: GIMO helps businesses reduce HR costs and increase employee engagement, leading to higher productivity.
4. **Financial Insights**: Their platform includes an EduHub offering financial tips and resources.

**Growth and Recent Developments**

With a team of around 40 employees, GIMO has already made considerable strides, recently completing a Series A funding round totaling $17.1 million. This funding will further fuel their expansion and help bridge the financial inclusion gap in Vietnam. Notable investors include names like TNB Aura and Y Combinator, indicating robust confidence in GIMO’s business model and vision.

**Customer Impact**

GIMO has been well-received by employers and employees alike. Factory workers have especially appreciated the ability to manage unexpected financial needs, contributing to a more stable financial environment. The feedback has illustrated that GIMO is not just a payroll solution but a tool for enhancing overall employee welfare.

**Conclusion**

In a world where financial flexibility is increasingly necessary, GIMO is paving the way for underbanked workers to gain access to their earnings when it's most needed. As they continue to innovate and expand their offerings, GIMO is set to make a significant impact on the lives of many workers in Vietnam and beyond.

For more details, check out their website at [gimo.vn](https://gimo.vn/en).
